lender.name: Nicolette
lender.loan_because: My grandparents gave me a Kiva gift certificate for Christmas. I think the idea is absolutely fantastic and I'm eager to help other people!

lender.name: Brendan
lender.loan_because: To help provide opportunity, fairness, and hope.

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be prosperous because my great-grandparents built businesses after immigrating to the United States. I want to help others build better lives for their children and grandchildren.
lender.occupational_info: I am helping to build a search engine to help people in Boston find news and information in their communities.

lender.name: Hank and Vicki
lender.occupation: Hank is retired. Vicki is a teacher
lender.loan_because: We want to give a helping hand to people who are attempting to improve their quality of life

lender.name: Misha
lender.occupational_info: I go to school everyday and work hard so I can go to college. I want to be an archeologist.

lender.name: donna_m
lender.loan_because:
Up until 2006, poverty, disease and death in the developing countries seemed to be a problem that was so huge that nothing I could do would help. So I did nothing.
I was wrong.
The same amount that I would spend on going to a movie can help a family put food on the table, find clean water, send their children to school for education, and build a business - even employ more people to make many lives better. I can no longer do nothing.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a photographer who shoots artistic things like nature and buildings, as well as musicians and bands for a few music magazines. I also write for the same magazines

lender.name: Michael and Matthew
lender.loan_because: We want to teach our son that we are part of a much larger community.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: This is a chance to really help someone who deserves it.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student studying geological engineering.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: I want to share what I have.
lender.occupational_info: I help children with emotional problems.

lender.name: Lindsey
lender.loan_because: We\'re all in this together.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I like the fact that my $1 can be used over and over to help more than one person.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: Over a decade ago, my grandmother Ellowese –a lovely, business-savvy, and very pious woman– presented me with a generous financial gift. Although I know she intended for me to invest in stocks, instead I chose to invest in myself, and along with my mother, started a graphics business. In the years since it has often been a struggle, many times scary, and sometimes exausting, but I wouldn\'t trade the experiences we\'ve had or the friends we\'ve made for all the wealth in the world. It\'s been an adventure and I know I will never be a slave to anyone because she gave me the gift of \"teaching a man to fish\". I was a risky investment, but ten years later we have helped so many people make their dreams a reality and I personally have so much more to offer. All because of her belief in me. I am so excited to have found this service and am loaning in her name, and in her memory. I know she would have approved. Thanks Grandma!
lender.occupational_info: I help people build online (internet) businesses.

lender.name: Drew
lender.loan_because: everybody deserves a chance to be able to support themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I study sociology.

lender.name: Marla
lender.loan_because: this was a Christmas gift from my son. I think it\'s a wonderful idea, and I have a special place in my heart for the people of Mexico.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English Language Learners at a high school in San Diego County, California. Most of them are from Mexico.

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of one.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: Life is full of opportunities :)

lender.name: JungFu
lender.loan_because: I believe in the ability of every person to succeed if given the opportunity and support, and that small business ownership can be one of the most empowering vehicles for self-sufficiency and community development.
lender.occupational_info: I build capacity at organizations through staff development and revenue generation.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves to see their dreams and hopes come true. If I can help even one person, the world is a richer, better place to live.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a major chemical company, scheduling production for insulation product which help cool and heat homes and businesses. The company I work for is also a major contributor to Habitat for Humanity.

lender.name: James and Denise
lender.loan_because: We loan because it is the right thing to do. It does our hearts good to know that we can help (even just a little) somebody else that is, maybe, not as fortunate as we are.

lender.name: Stefan
lender.loan_because: Someone has helped me.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.occupational_info: I am a pilot in the Air Force

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: One cannot obtain water from the earth without \\\'priming the pump\\\'. Therefore, we must also prime the social pump for humanity to benefit.
lender.occupational_info: I paint pictures with words to make light of the dark.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I remember visiting Mexico when I was a child and the impact I had from being approached by impoverished children. Since then I made a promise to myself that I would find some way to help people in these conditions. I believe I have found what I have been looking for. ^_^
lender.occupational_info: I have been translating for Kiva since the summer of '09.

lender.name: morgan and peter
lender.loan_because: It is important to me that my daughter see how hard people work to support themselves and their families and that it is important to support others.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: People need to get creative if anything's going to change. I like that Kiva is part of an innovative movement that increases the likelihood of positive change in the world. I lend because my faith demands that we prefer the poor to ourselves, and this is one small way to take one small step in the direction of being Christ-like.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I am happy to help people around the world see Americans reach out to them. Other people helped my family, so I am happy to help yours.
lender.occupational_info: I write books.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I can. Entrepreneurs are badasses, so hell yeah I\'ll help \'em out a bit.

lender.name: Kendall
lender.loan_because: A small amount to me is a great amount for another.

lender.name: Myrna
lender.loan_because: God has been good to me and I enjoy helping others.

lender.name: curt
lender.loan_because: hopefully the loans will make a difference in some deserving lives
lender.occupational_info: capital formation

lender.name: Slattery
lender.loan_because: Good investment. Probably safer than S&P500!

lender.name: Fred Cipriano
lender.occupational_info:
Fredrick.cipriano@gmail.com
(215)3167zero83

lender.name: Kirk
lender.loan_because: I think it is important to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Ray & Brenda
lender.loan_because: We understand the need for capital in small business start-ups
lender.occupational_info: retired small business owners

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I feel it is important to help others in anyway we can. I admire people who have the strength to start and run their own business.
lender.occupational_info: When people buy a home I make sure all of the paperwork is correct.

lender.name: Mukkul
lender.loan_because: Earning 4-5% interest on the cash doesnt feel as satisfying :)\r\nI\'m fortunate enough to enjoy life as I want it and in most cases I would probably spend more on a weekend trip to some city, so its almost a no brainer to loan.
lender.occupational_info: I work on computers, build software.

lender.name: Cory
lender.loan_because: The dreams are so big, but they\'re so easy to help make come true. What I spend on a couple lunches can help somebody start his or her own business--a business that will help feed a family and contribute to a community. That\'s a beautiful thing.
lender.occupational_info: I design computer programs that people in hospitals use. What I do helps sick people receive care more quickly, more efficiently, and more safely.

lender.name: Stan & Kathleen
lender.loan_because: We have always been enriched by sharing. If everyone shared just a little with their neighbors far and near, the world would be happier and our circle of friends would be astounding!
lender.occupational_info: We own business brokerage and consulting business.

lender.name: Peter
lender.occupational_info: I work to get people on TV, Radio, or Television to promote their books or organizations.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: we all need a boost up from time to time, and it's not always available. These people aren't asking for handouts, they're business people trying to build a better life for themselves and their families in places where that can be quite challenging. If I can help someone do that with just $25, I have to.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: This is a way I can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I look at how the built environment supports (or doesn't) its users, and help to design better solutions.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: by loaning rather than giving, I can help 100 people with the same ball of money, instead of just 1. My efforts can be recycled. Also, the recipient of the money is not burdened by the feeling of having received charity. By repaying the loan, they keep and add to their personal dignity and their reputation. Charity is an interaction between the high and the low. A loan is an interaction between equals. That is very important to how people relate to each other around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my child. I bake, cook, and tend the garden. Next year I hope to go to graduate school and get a masters degree in environmental science, so I can do work that helps everyone.

lender.name: Armando
lender.loan_because: I can and should.
lender.occupational_info: computational biologist

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: ...someone once gave me a loan and leases to grow my business.
lender.occupational_info: I invest in high technology business in California

lender.name: Bradley
lender.loan_because: I have been very lucky to have all the privileges of living in the country of Canada, having a good education, extensive world travel, well paying occupation and an alumni of the Internationally acclaimed group - Up With People. Some 25 years ago, I travelled the world for 1 year building bridges of communication and understanding amongst the difference places and people of the world. Finding the Kiva organization has provided another outlet for me to continue to hopefully make a difference in other people\'s lives. It not about just giving money to someone less fortunate, it is about changing lives by giving a hard working person that has personal dignity and passion to make a better life and a break...as I have had in my life. I encourage you to get involve...and make a difference!
lender.occupational_info: I work as Head of Sales Planning and Performance Management for Canada\'s largest bank. I report on sales effectiveness relative to growth targets and advise Senior Executive of YTD progress.

lender.name: Don & Pamela
lender.loan_because: The greater good depends upon all of us participating

lender.name: Mary
lender.occupation: Teacher in a Quaker school in North Carolina, USA
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to have built my dreams and I wish to help those who also have dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I teach young children to read and to write, to learn about a diverse world, and to recognize the importance of living simply and with respect for all of life.

lender.name: Charles & Elizabeth
lender.occupational_info: Charlie teaches college biology and Elizabeth is the executive director of a volunteer center that connects people with opportunities to serve through a variety of programs and services for individuals, families, youth, senior citizens, and businesses.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I can and I want to.
lender.occupational_info: I sit with people through their suffering. I also help people to remember and practice compassion for themselves and others.

lender.name: ALLEN
lender.loan_because: I want to make a positive change/opportunity for someone less fortunate than I with the sincere hope that the family/individual will become more successful in meeting their needs.
lender.occupational_info: I work with families that are in need of counselling to improve thir parenting skills ; and with individual children and youth to improve functioning and promote positive self- esteem.

lender.name: Giovanna
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to be in a position to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I sell kitchen cabinets to contractors and do it yourself home owners.

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.loan_because: as individuals we have the power to make a difference. We can lend a helping hand and lift each other out of despair. All it takes is the desire to do so.

lender.name: Howard-Lewis Family
lender.loan_because: My brother and sister-in-law gave as gifts for x-mas. This has been a great experience for our teenage daughters. They never knew so little could make such a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an agency who provides meaningful work opportunities to adults with developmental disabilities. My job is to write and implement a plan for that to happen as well as maintaining employment. I address barriers to such employment and how to overcome them.

lender.name: Narain
lender.loan_because: i want to build an eco system of entrepreneurship across the globe, in addition, i would like to also start something similar in this nature for India
lender.occupational_info: I run a Web application company based out of India [www.equvia.com] and we have a visual collaboration product for the ad. agencies, manufacturing, online advertising, video segments - Watch www.tracbac.com

lender.name: Gaurav & Swati
lender.loan_because: I know it helps
lender.occupational_info: Manage global software development program that enable local economies

lender.name: Nicolien
lender.occupational_info:
I write, I translate, I edit. Basically I make things understandable for as many people as possible.
Here is my website: www.qussa.nl

lender.name: Glenda
lender.loan_because: If not now, then when? So much more is left to do. If not me, then who?
lender.occupational_info: At home, I volunteer with an organization (Friends of the Lakeshore Nature Preserve) that helps protect, restore and take care of a local natural area. I also participate in many service trips around the world (Philippines, Nicaragua, Guatemala, El Salvador, Mexico and Uganda). I do wildlife fieldwork, help construct houses and water systems, work on reforestation, and help medical personnel.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a wonderful way to enable individuals to help themselves.

lender.name: matthew
lender.loan_because: i should

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: if you buy a man a fish, you feed him for a day. Loan a man money to buy a fishing pole and you feed him for a lifetime, and then you get your money back to do it all over again.
lender.occupational_info: I am a 19 yr old student at Johns Hopkins University who is pursuing a career as a physician.

lender.name: Giovanna
lender.loan_because: I know it\'s tough to start your own business. Sometimes people need a little capital push to get things started. I really enjoy helping people with an entrepreneurial drive.
lender.occupational_info: I am also a small business owner.

lender.name: Ankur - Infotrex.com
lender.occupation: CEO of Infotrex Servces Pvt. Ltd.
lender.loan_because: I love to help entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: Email Marketing, Social Media Marketing, Internet Marketing, Personal Branding, Web Application/Web Site Development, Search Engine Optimization

lender.name: BellaOnline.com
lender.loan_because: BellaOnline supports charity in many ways, including donating millions of ads each month to a wide variety of charity organizations.
lender.occupational_info: BellaOnline\'s 300+ editors each work together towards our goal of making our world a better place to live in.

lender.name: Andréa e Gianandrea
lender.loan_because: We think that is really important to loan to someone who's trying to build his future. These loans give hope.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because:
I remember how hard it was for me starting up my own company 10 years ago and know how hard it is to run a maintain a company in a developed country with credit cards and credit lines.
I have had the privilege to visit several under developed villages in South America (while being spoiled at All-Inclusive resorts that they work 12 hour days at spoiling us) and it is always amazing how so little CAN and DOES go so far for them and how, I do not know what the word is for us, but we are spoiled, wasteful, ungrateful and lucky and we grow up not even knowing it. And many of realize this while on vacation, and all come home to our regular lives with giving it another thought.
 I took my daughter to the Dominican when she was 11, while on a day trip going threw a little village she thought it was staged, no one could live like that! It took a whole day of several village to convince her it was real and they CAN survive ok without all we have and we have so much more than we need. As families of 3 we have 5 TV’s, 3 cell phones, 3 computers, 1 laptop ect… like most and the list goes on
I do not have much to spare, I am a single self-employed mother of 2 teenagers but I want to help. By setting aside what would amount to less that 2 pairs of jeans and a top for my daughter, $200.00, I can make a real difference to a few people who will be very thank-full, unlike the teenager who come to expect it.
lender.occupational_info: I do bookkeeping & taxation for business and personal. I help business keep current with their government tax filing requirements and track their Income & expenses.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: "If you haven't got any charity in your heart, you have the worst kind of heart trouble." Bob Hope American comedian and film actor (1903-2003)
lender.occupational_info: My work takes me overseas and I witness first hand the struggle that many people face on a daily basis just to survive

lender.name: Clodius Willis
lender.loan_because: Loaning money for me is a way to travel and meet people by helping them.

lender.name: jamie
lender.loan_because: of the assistance I have recieved. now I would like to give hard-working visionaries with little means the same assistance.
lender.occupational_info: I teach intermediate language arts to 13-15 year olds.

lender.name: Marion Graham Collegiate
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone needs help from time to time.

lender.name: Sharie
lender.loan_because: It gives people an opportunity to create productive community life.

lender.name: Terrell
lender.loan_because: I like to see everyone have a chance to strive for financial independence.
lender.occupational_info: I setup and maintain computer networks for a Publishing Firm. I also manage of group of 5 Techs.

lender.name: Dr. Quang
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Laura
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student at the University of Wisconsin in Madison!

lender.name: trekerboy
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student of anthropology and human-computer interaction

lender.name: Leo & Jennifer
lender.loan_because: we love to see people follow their dreams and build better lives for their families.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: in North America, we have so much... it\'s an honour and a privilege to help someone in a developing country who needs it.
lender.occupational_info: I\'m a freelance writer, author, and illustrator, with my latest book coming out in January 2007.

lender.name: Robby
lender.loan_because: We're all family, and family takes care of eachother

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because:
Why not let small business operators benefit from my money, rather than let it sit idle in the bank? An effortless way to change the world and the greatest geography lesson I've ever learned.
To be alerted to loans of interest, visit http://www.kivaalerts.com/
lender.occupational_info: I work to organise arts festivals and I am the team leader of Kiva's Australia team.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I love this concept, and I can make a difference.

lender.name: Hugh
lender.loan_because: I think kiva.org is providing a wonderful service unavailable otherwise by enableing "lenders" to assist in building a sustainable living with those in need.
lender.occupational_info: Chief Administrative Officer with an urban community bank based in Nashville, TN.

lender.name: Manette and Ron
lender.loan_because: it makes us happy!

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying molecular biology and I am in the process of applying to medical school.

lender.name: stevenj
lender.loan_because: I enjoy assisting individuals by being a member of a socially-minded, international community -- helping to break the cycle of poverty through lending.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: I believe that small loans are more productive on the scale of the individual and the community than large loans.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student of energy and climate sustainability.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I believe that people become empowered in their lives when money is loaned rather than given. Giving money can be disempowering.
lender.occupational_info: I run a non-profit environmental education organization--in the business of teaching kids to take care of our world.

lender.name: Lesli S.
lender.loan_because: I have been to Kenya (my parents live there) and always wanted to know how to help people be self-sufficient. This is by far the best method of helping people help themselves. I can do something from my home here in the U.S. Work hard. Be happy! I have Kenyan dust on my feet!
lender.occupational_info: I care for our home and care for my twin boys who are 3 years old. I cook. I wash. I volunteer at church. Then I do more cooking and more washing! Smile. Before I had twin boys I was a school teacher.

lender.name: mike+rani
lender.loan_because: we loan because we believe in taking small steps towards big dreams.

lender.name: Ori Ben-Dov
lender.loan_because: It's an opportunity to give to share the opportunities I have.

lender.name: Xavier
lender.loan_because: I find internet is a fantastic opportunity to act as a citizen who cares about social equity... It allows us not to follow the wrong rules that try to make the same people richer and the other poorest. And I know, my english is too bad ! Sorry about that ;-)
lender.occupational_info: I create animated TV series for kids that like to laugh

lender.name: Eyal
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people who are motivated to improve their situation throe working. I try to help as I can.

lender.name: benson
lender.loan_because: improve my business to change my life
lender.occupational_info: through pictures my business will be seen all over the world

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: When hardworking people get a chance to succeed, they probably will. All they need is a start!

lender.name: Omri
lender.loan_because: At last I found a good thing to do with my money!

lender.name: Kathe
lender.loan_because: I think it is a very good way to support for selfengagement.

lender.name: Yotam
lender.loan_because: For the good of others.

lender.name: Yahav
lender.loan_because: Helping people to achieve sucses in their life
lender.occupational_info: Managing an internet cafe shop.

lender.name: Corbett and Molly Troyer
lender.loan_because: We loan because we are blessed with what we have in this country, and feel compelled to share our resources with those in need.
lender.occupational_info: Molly is a corporate trainer, and Corbett is a clinical social worker.

lender.name: Elin
lender.loan_because: everyone desirves a chance! :o)\r\nGod bless...

lender.name: Emmanuel
lender.loan_because: I would like to help others
lender.occupational_info: I try to understand how to use the color of the oceans to learn how the oceans function.

lender.name: Mounu Sharon
lender.loan_because: my heart wants to support these familys, the children...........this country
lender.occupational_info: I help manage a business that creates custom plans for new homes. And I write music and stories.

lender.name: Nanna
lender.loan_because: I think this a wonderful way to help other children, by helping their parents!

lender.name: Avia
lender.loan_because: I believe that global inequality is a grave injustice
lender.occupational_info: I hold an academic position at the Department of Political Science in University College London

lender.name: Kirstine
lender.loan_because: Everybody deserves a fair chance in life, and this is a small step towards that.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that makes trivia board games

lender.name: The Clarks
lender.loan_because: I see myself in their faces.

lender.name: Avi
lender.loan_because: It is a better and honorable way to help others.

lender.name: Margaret & Stan
lender.loan_because: We want to share our good fortune with others around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Stan worked in a hospital setting, with people needing assistance to get the health care they needed. Margaret worked as a psychotherapist with children, adults and families. We now enjoy creative pursuits as well as volunteer service.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: Because I can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach university students about the politics in developing countries, mainly in Africa.

lender.name: Adamsky Family
lender.loan_because: we like to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Dad is a computer engineer. Mom is a teacher of students ages 5-8 in a low-income district. Kids are all in school.

lender.name: Flemming
lender.loan_because: I do hope that I help to make a difference to the people I grant a loan to.

lender.name: mark & myriam
lender.loan_because: We want to help people less fortunate that us to have a real chance in life.
lender.occupational_info: As a trade unionist for the UK\'s largest public sector trade union, UNISON, I represent health workers who work for the NHS in the UK and help to defend their rights at work.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I would like to help someone get started in business - working to earn a living is the best way to progress in life.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a Non Governmental Organisation that represents the airports of the world to the International Civil Aviation Organisation, a branch of the UN.

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I think this is a wonderful way to connect with other cultures, and provide a lift for those in need easily, and recycle the funds for other needy individuals.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Doctor in New York, and volunteer for many organizations to help my community. I have been involved in Rotary International for 7 years, and think that microlending through Kiva is a natural extension of our work within Rotary.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and believe that I am called to share.
lender.occupational_info: We prepare and deliver 1300 nutritous lunches every day, to children in Calgary schools that would otherwise do without.

lender.name: lawrence
lender.loan_because: of my sister's generosity of knowing how to help others.

lender.name: LORI/JAMES/ERIN
lender.loan_because: I received my first loan money as a gift & now I'm hooked!! It feels great to help people that I don't even know!
lender.occupational_info: I am a stay at home Mom.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: it\'s common sense to do so! I\'m in my early twenties and still struggling to add to my savings... but the money I do have lives an idle life. Why not put it to work?

lender.name: Leah
lender.loan_because: It's an easy way to help transfer the wealth and power from those lucky enough to be born in the Global North to the Global South. My career is dedicated to international development, but even that is not enough.
lender.occupational_info: I work on international development programs in Sub-Saharan Africa.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I loan because I want to participate in God\'s concern for the poor and vulnerable. Having traveled in developing countries, I have also seen the sickening effects of poverty and want to play some part in ending this scourge. Micro-loans are great way to help.
lender.occupational_info: I teach religion and philosophy at Shenandoah University in Virginia; it\'s about an hour from Washington,D.C. In addition, I am actively involved in working for peace and justice.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I get pleasure from helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I Manage an Aircraft Detailing Company

lender.name: Kurt
lender.loan_because: I lived for two years in a third-world country where I met some of the greatest people in the world. By lending money to entrepreneurs, our family hopes to make a difference in others' lives.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an attorney, and my wife is a full-time mom and occasional web designer. Our daughter is 2 years old!

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I wanted to help someone deserving out.
lender.occupational_info: I sell on ebay...

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I have been self employed before and know the challenges involved.

lender.name: Danny
lender.loan_because: I want to bless others with what I have been blessed with.
lender.occupational_info: I assist in lending money to commercial real estate developers and investors.

lender.name: Roman
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I'm looking for business opportunities for the company, analyze them and make recommendations to top management about lucrative opportunities.

lender.name: Eyal
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a hand in life sometimes and a small amount can go a long way.

lender.name: varda
lender.loan_because: I think that a small amount on my part can make a big change for another women. I like to loan and help artist women like myself
lender.occupational_info: Artistic coloring on wooden items such as trays, small tables, kids chairs and more

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: I can help people
lender.occupational_info: grow cotton, other crops

lender.name: René Hansen
lender.loan_because: It makes sense. Free things do not create efficiency...only dependency. I want people to be independent in the long run...

lender.name: rogelio
lender.loan_because: i will use for my small business and help other poor people on our area.
lender.occupational_info: retail store

lender.name: Oren
lender.loan_because: well that\'s a tough one, I better avoid it...
lender.occupational_info: I spend half of my working day typing with 2 fingers on a dark keyboard, and the other half working on the garden outside

lender.name: Ahmed S. Farag
lender.loan_because: I want to give the chance and opportunity to people where banks mostly fail to do so.
lender.occupational_info: Social Development

lender.name: Elad
lender.loan_because: I believe that without the necessary financial capital, individuals in developing countries will be unable to lift themselves out of poverty.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.occupation: Working! I found a great job! =)
lender.loan_because: I have been very blessed financially and therefore, I want to share my blessings with others. The Bible says that to whom more is given, more is expected and that the man who helps his neighbor shall be blessed. So, why not?
lender.occupational_info: I work in Historic Preservation, so I study old buildings and find out how to repair them so that the public can visit them.

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: there is a need
lender.occupational_info: Investments

lender.name: Troels
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great way to support entrepreneurs in the developing world.

lender.name: Jonas
lender.loan_because: I believe that access to fair priced capital can allow some people to lift themselves out of poverty. At the same time I am certain that microfinance is not the one-cure-pill that can alleviate poverty alltogether. Development is a multiple-faced and complex thing that can not easily be achieved. However I think all should be involved in helping those less fortunate and this is definately one of the ways.

lender.name: Lyndsey
lender.loan_because: I want to enable entrepreneurs who have good ideas and are motivated to make their lives better and their communities stronger.

lender.name: Churchman Family
lender.loan_because: This is the kind of people to people contact that helps people grow.
lender.occupational_info: I work with schools.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: We are not here merely to make a living. We are here to enrich the world

lender.name: Greg Stephens
lender.loan_because: People with initiative should be supported.
lender.occupational_info: Education - High School Geography Teacher

lender.name: Reluctant Thinker
lender.loan_because: together, we can change the world.

lender.name: RWJ Clinical Scholars
lender.occupational_info: We try to make sure that everyone has access to quality health care.

lender.name: stephen
lender.loan_because: this sound like a great idea. Loaning small amounts of money to actual people with ideas to improve themselves and their communities.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe everyone should have the chance to succeed if they so desire. We as Americans take a lot for granted. Plus, it makes me feel good!

lender.name: Andrew
lender.occupational_info: I help companies learn how to better communicate internally and externally. My main focus is on leveraging portal technologies to help socialize the enterprise.

lender.name: Renato
lender.loan_because: it is a necessary help
lender.occupational_info: very good

lender.name: Polytechnic School
lender.loan_because: We would like to help eradicate extreme poverty.
lender.occupational_info: We are middle school students looking at global issues. We have been working on learning as much as we can about global poverty and are trying to raise awareness and find ways to help.

lender.name: paul
lender.loan_because: i need a loan because i want to increase the scale of my business. i wish to import more computers,printers i wish to increas my network so please i need a loan
lender.occupational_info: i have a small enterprise, i sell computers, repair computers and also i provide classes for less privileged

lender.name: Dar, Steve, & Lotta
lender.loan_because: As a US citizen, I want in some small way to mend the damage my country has done with it's warring ways. Extending a helping hand across the world is a start.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: We all need a hand sometime and Kiva makes it easy to return the favour.
lender.occupational_info: I advise people seeking to improve their lives.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: because I feel that if we help one another we can change the current state of poverty and undernourishment.

lender.name: Mig
lender.loan_because: People, not governments, are what make a difference in this world.

lender.name: jean-patrice
lender.loan_because: oublier c'est humain, agir aussi :)

lender.name: Thomas and Family
lender.loan_because: We want to help improve the lives of others that need loans, to be self sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I am a builder involved in residential remodeling projects. My sister Susan helps the blind. My brother in-law Karl sells lumber. My wife Marianne works for an insurance company. My Mother Patricia is retired and helps others through the church and community by volunteering.

lender.name: Frode Egeland
lender.loan_because: I want to help eradicate poverty. This is a small step, but a positive one, towards that goal.
lender.occupational_info: I'm working as a Linux Sysadmin

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: It\\\'s a great opportunity to make a positive impact in someone\\\'s life.

lender.name: Michael Peachey
lender.loan_because:
An interesting Pew Research study seems to indicate that the best predictor of feeling like you have enough is not how much you have, but how much you give to others.
Giving is ultimately a celebration of choice and control over one's path, and an acknowledgment of one's capacity to have less and need less.
lender.occupational_info: I work to make the internet a better place for all users.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: It feels good to know I am helping someone build a better life for themselves and their family and create a stronger community.

lender.name: carol
lender.loan_because: I can. I want to see my loan go to specific people to use for specific needs. This is a wonderful way to help people to help themselves.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: it is an expression of my faith. I am privileged and want to share what I have.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student pharmacist at The University of Minnesota.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: We are all connected

lender.name: Levi
lender.loan_because: It works

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: It's easy for me to help people across the world improve their lives, I would be lazy not to do it. The borrowers are the ones doing the hard work.
lender.occupational_info: I write and run physics-based computer programs for scientific research. I volunteer at a local after school program. You can see that I lent to animal husbandry practices in the past. I am sorry about that, but what's done is done. Since becoming vegan, I have decided to lend only to animal-friendly business plans. I absolutely want to encourage respect and kindness toward all animalkind, including humans.

lender.name: jean
lender.occupational_info: I teach law-related subjects at a local university, practice pro bono law, and also help people improve their fitness levels through exercise designed for them.

lender.name: Impala Image Works
lender.loan_because: Everyone can do something to make a difference - even if it's only $25.00 at a time.
lender.occupational_info: Digital preservation of photos, journals, memoirs and documentation of art collections.

lender.name: Blake & Britta
lender.loan_because: my wife and I love reading the stories and supporting these entrepreneurs!
lender.occupational_info: Studying entrepreneurship and social enterprise.

lender.name: Dereck
lender.loan_because: Misers do not go to the world of the gods; they do not want to give. The wise are generous, and go to a happier world. -Buddha-

lender.name: Therry
lender.loan_because: I love handbags, and the idea of helping an Eastern European man who also likes handbags is very appealing to me.
lender.occupational_info: I teach a weekly class to teenagers about how to be an ethical, loving person. I also teach a weekly class about opera. I work for my town helping to conserve land and protect water sources. I\'m a good adventurous cook, and I can\'t get through the day without music.

lender.name: Bruce Taylor
lender.loan_because: Helping others out with microcredit is a fantastic idea and something I feel is not just my right, but my responsibility. We only succeed if we all succeed. This is also a great tool to utilize in my classroom and I incorporate it into my lessons on consumption and global economics.
lender.occupational_info: Social Science/Science teacher with an aim on debunking a consumption based society

lender.name: Matt, Suki, & Juno
lender.loan_because: We know people work hard and we want to help other families around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Suki helps people with their medications and Matt writes computer software.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: lending creates accountability and motivation and improves a person's overall dignity. Charity creates a dependent mindset.
lender.occupational_info: I have been incredibly fortunate in my life and want my second career to be focused on helping others be equally fortunate.

lender.name: Jake and Desira
lender.loan_because: I have it to lend and enjoy helping others get ahead

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping others in a way that provides them with dignity and self-sustainability.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who have a hard time learning at school and who have a hard time feeling happy.

lender.name: mark
lender.loan_because: I can\'t not.
lender.occupational_info: Helping connect people both to one another and to the better angels of their nature.

lender.name: Bryan
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurship and the free market are the world's most powerful economic forces.
lender.occupational_info: I am advise businesses and resolve disputes with their employees, vendors, business partners, and the government.

lender.name: Rafael F. Moreno
lender.loan_because: Helping others with a passion and drive for business that will support their community in a positive manner is a social responsibility.
lender.occupational_info: I build and fix bikes!!!!!

lender.name: Cory
lender.loan_because: i like to root for the underdogs

lender.name: Kristi
lender.loan_because: I have a passion for helping others help themselves. It is a gift that will keep on giving from generation to generation, and this organization seems like an amazing opportunity for people who want to better their lives and the lives of their loved ones.
lender.occupational_info: When children in California don't have permanent homes to live in because their parents can't take proper care of them, I help find them permanent homes where they can be loved and cared for forever.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: It is extremely important to me to help others in any way I can. The issue of poverty is one that each of us can help solve in our own way. Kiva is a wonderful organization that enables ordinary people to help others thousands of miles away. It feels so great to be able to help someone achieve their goals, especially when he or she is working so hard to attain them.

lender.name: Shedrick
lender.occupational_info: I apply chemical and organic treatments to turf and ornamental plants. I currently work for a well known company in that field. After two years I decided to get certified to do it myself. There is great potential and I love to see the results and the satisfaction of a customer form the service. With proper treatment and sound cultural practices, I\'m confident to produce a healthy, green lawn 99% of the time.

lender.name: Judson
lender.loan_because: Its the right thing to do!

lender.name: Rebekah
lender.loan_because: it makes me happy.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: I like too help other people. Due to MIFEX problem I can't make any new loan, because I haven´t go the money to lend out again.
lender.occupational_info: Office work

lender.name: Arcadi
lender.loan_because: Wanted to help and see if it works.
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer engineer

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: We all need to help better this world.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: The exorbitant affluence of a lower-middleclass American should be shared with those willing to work toward making a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I try to keep a few hectares of good habitat available to the native wildlife.

lender.name: Glenn
lender.occupational_info: Try to understand disease and genetic related alterations in brain morphology.

lender.name: Desire
lender.loan_because: I want to make sure that as God blesses me I am a blessing to someone else. I don\\\'t deserve any of what little I do have.
lender.occupational_info: I love being an illustrator. It\\\'s more than a passion. It\\\'s my lifestyle.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: This seems like an interesting alternative to charity.
lender.occupational_info: I think, read, and write philosophical things.

lender.name: Betty
lender.loan_because: My son introduced me to the site on my birthday with a Kiva gift certificate. What a great gift! I am so excited to be helping these folks to provide for their children.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired and spend a lot of my time with my grandchildren. I also help with the finance committee at my church. This work is much more fulfilling than my years employed as an accountant!

lender.name: Southern Utah Family
lender.loan_because: We are fellow entrepreneurs. We began our businesses with very little capital, also. We know how difficult it is to have a successful business, even in the best of circumstances. We have been greatly blessed and we are now responsible to bless others. Kiva.org has given us that opportunity. Thanks to my brother and sister-in-law for telling us about this opportunity!
lender.occupational_info: We buy, sell and lease homes in our state. We also own an electrical contracting company which employees 30 people and provides the wiring and other technical services in order for homes and businesses to have power and electricity, telephone and other technological capabilities.

lender.name: Cannon
lender.loan_because: I care about helping
lender.occupational_info:
As background, I am the Chief Executive Officer of Human Rights Initiative of North Texas (HRI). For this letter to be effective, let me provide you further with a brief background on this agency:

History of the Organization
HRI is a nonprofit corporation that was formed in 1999 in Dallas to provide legal services to victims of human rights abuses. The organization was created by a group of dedicated professionals and volunteers; HRI is the result of their concern for those who seek safe haven in the United States after suffering religious, social or political persecution in their homelands. HRI also assists immigrants with special abuse issues, such as women and children victims of domestic violence. As a natural extension of our legal representation services, HRI also assists immigrants and refugees in their struggles to make the necessary lifestyle, cultural and social adjustments after experiencing trauma and loss.

lender.name: Torben Jensen
lender.loan_because: It's a good way to really make a difference

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: Other people seem to be able to use my money much more wisely than I do!
lender.occupational_info: I help people find the information they need.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I would rather loan or give money to someone who is making a better life for themselves through hard work rather than just taking money they didn\'t earn. \r\n\r\nI think this site is a fantastic idea to help people. People appreciate better what they have worked for instead of what is just given to them. I know this because I have earned the life I am living, I had plenty of help, and this seems to be a great way to help people who are trying to do what I was able to do.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I like to help others start businesses and see them succeed. To also see them happy and control their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Design websites, traveler, MBA Student, and Entrepreneur.

lender.name: Pam & Carroll
lender.loan_because: Our wish to help others that work hard but have been less fortunate than us.
lender.occupational_info: We do volunteer work. Pam does historical and other work in our town. Her husband, Carroll, does lots of athletics officiating around the world.

lender.name: Pamoja.org
lender.occupation: We raise money to support microfinance in Africa
lender.loan_because: We are a Vancouver, BC based public foundation that raises money to help increase the availability of microfinance in East Africa
lender.occupational_info:
Pamoja Foundation's goal is to create a cycle of empowerment through both lending and donations, leading to financial self-sufficiency and the opportunity for a better future.
Feel free to donate to the link below.

lender.name: Yahhazie
lender.occupation: Shoshone Native American Beadwork Artist, Teacher
lender.loan_because: the spirit of giving works for both the receiver and the giver.
lender.occupational_info: i am an native american shoshone, and sell authentic shoshone beadwork. i also sell beads from all around the world, most specifically Czech Glass Beads.

lender.name: Evyatar
lender.loan_because: those who have should give those who do not have. Simple, right?
lender.occupational_info: Teaching in a university.

lender.name: George &Gigi
lender.loan_because: We are so grateful to Kiva for giving us the power to use our limited resources to make a big difference for good people who need help in other countries. Kiva is a gift to us as much as to loan recipients. We wish them all well.
lender.occupational_info: We write financial newsletters about China and about global dividend-paying stocks. We have each written and ghost-written books (a total of six). People who read our work hopefully use our words to find ways to invest their money profitably

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: A never ending fund for people to use for the betterment of all human kind is a No Brainer

lender.name: Lisbeth
lender.loan_because: The idea of Kiva is excellent! The internet is used in the very best way when it can help bringing people closer together. I loan because the Kiva-concept just seems as a very simple, transparent and effective way of supporting good intentions and development - for the benefit of all.
lender.occupational_info: I work with administration. When not working I enjoy photographing.

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving honest people a chance to change their lives for the better. They will then be able to help others later and the snowball effect will benefit many entrepeneurs and their families. In the third world there is a lot of corruption that undermines economic growth and prevent the countries from developing. The problem has always been how to find good and trustworthy people. Therefore I think we owe them our support.

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: It is essential that we do everything possible to to bring together the gap between wealth and poverty to ensure peace and stablility for the future.
lender.occupational_info: I a musician I hope to lift the spirits of those aroung me as I hope to do with this loan to you.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: This website makes it easy.

lender.name: paul
lender.loan_because: why not?

lender.name: Kris
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: To set an example for my grandchildren. They are becoming involved and learning the pleasure of helping others.

lender.name: Lee
lender.loan_because: I like supporting something I think is important, and feeling that I am a part of something bigger than myself.

lender.name: Lindsey
lender.loan_because: Love helping people who are trying to make their lives stusainable through agriculture;)
lender.occupational_info: I am in distribution sales of veterinairan drugs, supplies, equipment and vaccines. Now a second year Vet Student at Colorado State UNiversity.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Lending a hand across the world is effective and rewarding. Thanks Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: I am a student of best business practices and how to apply them to social goals

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: I expect to make a profit. And I think it's great that I can do so while helping others at the same time.
lender.occupational_info: I build lasers that are used in industrial etching and cutting.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: I want to share some of the success I have been blessed to achieve with other people so that they might enjoy some success of their own.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a regional 911 center as an emergency dispatcher.

lender.name: Raena
lender.loan_because: I think most people just need that one break in their life to get ahead and stand on their own two feet. This site is a wonderful opportunity for people on both ends to give and to recieve and both can be challenging at times. I think the work done here is important and I am honored to be a Member of Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I try to live my best life everyday !

lender.name: Roni
lender.loan_because: I want to make good
lender.occupational_info: I am a peace and environment activist, and I live in Israel.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I see the effects of poverty on a daily basis and as individuals we can make a difference in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I work to stabilize families in need who present with numerous challenges and in addition, strengths.

lender.name: Gianluca
lender.loan_because: I understand the passion of an entrepreneur and the challenge of raising funds.

lender.name: ebenezer
lender.loan_because: I am a founder of Global youth for Peace Club based in Accra-Ghana, My mission is to find and support the rural sick, hiv, orphans, farming to support the hungry, training the youths at conflict areas in Ghana and other parts of africa with the funds i raise from you lenders.\r\nWe cherish you Godly support for the needy people in Africa.\r\nGod and Allah bless us all AmeN!
lender.occupational_info: Though iam a professional designer i took it upon myself as one duty to support and help the needy in all sphers of live. I go round and communicate with people all over Africa.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I like to lend in a transparent way where I can see the benefits
lender.occupational_info: I work to investigate new ways that charities can approach their donors

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want others to have a chance to be successful in their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I search for oil and gas.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: People working together to help other people can make a big difference. I'm glad Kiva provides the opportunity to all of us.
lender.occupational_info: I edit the Orchids page at BellaOnline.com which is a group of people who share information about what they love to do.

lender.name: trace
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in live and people should help one another.
lender.occupational_info: Boring. I sit at a computer in an office all day. I wish to be a writer.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I would like to help others improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I provide services to firms to assist them in complying with environmental regulations. Specifically, I manage projects that involve collecting groundwater and soil samples that are analyzed to determine if the media has been effected by the clients business. I then work with the client to address the impacts.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: The system is most efficient.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work in high tech electronics

lender.name: Emily
lender.occupational_info: I make wooden boxes, jewelry and accessories

lender.name: Trenton
lender.loan_because: microcredit, while not a panacea, is the most powerful intervention we have for sustainable poverty alleviation.

lender.name: Trent
lender.loan_because: I want them to have enough.
lender.occupational_info: I am ten. My other mom Sabrina helped me start lending at Kiva. I like the color black. I am good at karate.

lender.name: Meg
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people, especially other women, to realize their own goals. Also, I am very grateful for all the hospitality and kindness I\'ve been shown by people during my various stays in East Africa - in Marsabit and Mombasa in Kenya, and in Arusha and Dar in Tanzania. I hope to keep returning, and am invested in many ways in this wonderful part of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student of literature (especially African literature) and women's studies. I like to think about things like how using certain languages helps people talk about their identity, and where people get their unconscious assumptions about the world.

lender.name: Tisa
lender.loan_because: it helps to satisfy a market failure, giving people and communities a chance that they wouldn't have otherwise had.
lender.occupational_info: I'm in school working toward a master's degree in public policy.

lender.name: Luke
lender.occupational_info: I help nonprofit organizations use the Internet for fund raising, advocacy, and communications.

lender.name: Lauren and Michael
lender.loan_because: it feels good.

lender.name: Ali Cherkaoui
lender.loan_because:
I strongly feel as a world citizen. But it has not always been like this : Born and raised in casablanca, morocco until the age of 19, i was lucky enough to study and start making a living in paris and around the world...
I deeply believe that i have a responsibility in the world that we live in.
Feeling and expressing compassion is not enough and it's important to start using [active solidarity] to help people to pull themselves out of poverty.
The day i discovered the Kiva website, was a great day in my life and i intend to use it as often as i can, to support other citizens of this world who deserve as much as me a decent life for them, their families and their children...
lender.occupational_info:
I work in the film industry as a first assistant director...
I organize film shoots, establish the shooting schedule, coordinate the different departments and run the set, day after day...
It's an intense and passionate job that is also full of Human Experiences with different people, different cultures and nations.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference because God has blessed us!
